attributes.action: CALL FOR A BY ELECTION IN DEWSBURY SOUTH WEST YORKS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with one elected councillor now switching  to independent it is only fair that a by election is called in dewsbury south

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
